pyramid.plunder

Class Drawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • pyramid.plunder.Drawable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Background, GameObject, Shader

    public abstract class Drawable
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the abstract Drawable Class; int keyLevel and boolean isGameObject are implemented; the getNextkey and isGameObject is defined as well.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Drawable(int keyLevel, boolean isGameObject)
      In this class, the int keyLevel and boolean isGameObject are implemented.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void Draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This abstract void Draw method uses the Graphics method.
      int getKey()
      This getKey method returns the key being selected.
      static int getNextKey()
      In this getNextKey method the key on the keyboard is chosen and the nextKey returned.
      static int getNextKey(int level)
      In this getNextKey method the int level is implemented.
      boolean isGameObject()
      This isGameObject method returns the gameObject.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Drawable

        public Drawable(int keyLevel,
        boolean isGameObject)
        In this class, the int keyLevel and boolean isGameObject are implemented. The getNextkey and isGameObject is defined as well.

    • Method Detail

      • getNextKey

        public static int getNextKey()
        In this getNextKey method the key on the keyboard is chosen and the nextKey returned.

      • getNextKey

        public static int getNextKey(int level)
        In this getNextKey method the int level is implemented. An else-if statement is used in order to implement the level.

      • getKey

        public int getKey()
        This getKey method returns the key being selected.

      • isGameObject

        public boolean isGameObject()
        This isGameObject method returns the gameObject.

      • Draw

        public abstract void Draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This abstract void Draw method uses the Graphics method.
